sentences.en: After a lot of agonizing she decided to terminate the pregnancy.
sentences.cn: 经历一番痛苦挣扎后，她决定终止妊娠。

sentences.en: For one agonizing moment, the dish was perched precariously on the bank of the canal, but it suddenly overbalanced and slid back into the water.
sentences.cn: 在令人坐卧不安的一瞬间，馅饼盘悬悬乎乎地停在运河岸边，然而它突然失去了平衡，滑回水中。

sentences.en: For one agonizing moment, the dish was perched precariously on the bank of the canal, but It'suddenly overbalanced and slid back into the water.
sentences.cn: 在令人坐卧不安的一瞬间, 馅饼盘悬悬乎乎地停在运河岸边, 然而它突然失去了平衡,滑回水中.

sentences.en: He did not wish to die the agonizing death of his mother and brother.
sentences.cn: 他不想像母亲和兄弟那样痛苦地死去。

sentences.en: He made a desperate, agonizing effort to wrench the top half of his body free.
sentences.cn: 他忍着剧痛拼命想坐了起来.

sentences.en: He watched helplessly as his mother died an agonizing death.
sentences.cn: 他无助地看着母亲痛苦地死去。

sentences.en: I spent days agonizing over whether to take the job or not.
sentences.cn: 我用了好些天苦苦思考是否接受这个工作。

sentences.en: I spent days agonizing over whether to take the job or not.
sentences.cn: 我用了好些天苦苦思考是否接受这份工作。

sentences.en: In the heat of Rome, the wait was agonizing.
sentences.cn: 在罗马的高温下，等待是一种折磨。

sentences.en: It is a most agonizing sight.
sentences.cn: 这种景象真是令人惨不忍睹.

sentences.en: It's something we've been struggling with, debating agonizing over for months.
sentences.cn: 这几个月来,我们一直在为这个问题努力 、 争论、挣扎.

sentences.en: Perhaps he was agonizing over the moral issues involved.
sentences.cn: 也许他正在为其中牵扯的道德问题而伤脑筋。

sentences.en: She only made the decision to apply for training after years of agonizing.
sentences.cn: 多年的苦苦思索之后，她才作出了申请培训的决定。

sentences.en: This is a torturous, agonizing way to kill someone.
sentences.cn: 这是一种让人受尽折磨、痛苦难忍的杀人方法。

sentences.en: Together, they vividly acted out this agonizing and heartbreaking epic love tale.
sentences.cn: 她们一起刻画了这段痛苦心碎的又如史诗般的浪漫史.

words.tran_cn: 感到极度痛苦的，苦闷的
苦恼；极大的痛苦；临死的挣扎
使极度痛苦（agonize的过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 痛苦难忍的，使人苦恼的
trans.tran_en: Something that is agonizing causes you to feel great physical or mental pain

trans.tran_cn: 使极度痛苦，折磨(agonize的ing形式)
使极度痛苦；折磨（agonize的ing形式）
